writer.name: 路易·奥斯皮纳 Luis Ospina

director.name: 路易·奥斯皮纳 Luis Ospina

this_title: La desazón suprema: Retrato de Fernando Vallejo
introduction: 纪录片关于哥伦比亚当代最受争议的小说家Fernando Vallejo，他的作品有《杀手的童贞》等。影片获04年法国图卢兹拉美影展最佳纪录片奖。You must see it or you had better read Fernando Vallejo. If you have ever read Fernando Vallejo you will enjoy it more.The film shows a non-stop coverage of the life of one the best or the writer in the spanish language.Fernando is a guy who only writes about him self.He had write about biology,a gramatic of the literary language, a beautiful novel called "El Desbarrancadero, which earned him the Romulo Gallegos prize.In El Debarrancadero he tells his brother of a ethic of evil:" you cant not be a good drunk man, a good homosexual and a good pot smoker at the same tome.You have got to make a choice". Fernando is the last gramatic of the spanish language.The work that Luis Ospina did is incredible.Go see this movie now.
chinese_title: La desazón suprema: Retrato de Fernando Vallejo
